title._content: Petition for a Writ of Certiorari from Clarence Gideon to the Supreme Court of the United States, 06/05/1962 (page 4 of 5)

description._content: From: Collection: Record Group 267: Records of the Supreme Court of the United States, 1772 - 2007 Created by: Supreme Court of the United States. (02/02/1790 - ) Production Date 06/05/1962 Persistent URL: arcweb.archives.gov/arc/action/ExternalIdSearch?id=597554 Repository: Archives I Reference Section, Textual Archives Services Division (NWCT1R) Reproductions may be ordered via an independent vendor. The U.S. National Archives maintains a list of vendors at www.archives.gov/research/order/vendors-photos-maps-dc.html. Access Restrictions: Unrestricted Use Restrictions: Unrestricted Learn More: This item is featured on the National Archives' Online Public Access blog, NARAtions. Check out the post here to read about what Cynthia Fox, Deputy Division Director of Archives I Textual Archives Services (NWCT1), says this record tells us about what democracy means to her and why she believes in the statement about the National Archives that says, “Democracy starts here.”
